first_para: Ruth Smeeth (born 1979) is a British Labour Party politician, who is the Labour Member of Parliament (MP) candidate for Stoke-on-Trent North in 2015.

full.extract: Ruth Smeeth (born 1979) is a British Labour Party politician, who is the Labour Member of Parliament (MP) candidate for Stoke-on-Trent North in 2015.
full.title: Ruth Smeeth
